name: Education is Easy
title: Top of the Class
description: In 2021, Spain achieved a near-perfect persistence rate to grade 5 and the last grade of primary school, with 99.97% and 99.94% of students respectively continuing their education. This highlights the country's commitment to ensuring students complete their primary education.

name: Healthcare Without Financial Fear
title: Minimal Financial Burden from Healthcare
description: In 2019, only 0.01% of Spain's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenses. This indicates a robust healthcare system that protects its citizens from financial distress.
